metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28805 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: singlevar in lparser.c in Lua through 5.4.4 lacks a certain luaK_exp2anyregup call, leading to a heap-based buffer over-read that might affect a system that compiles untrusted Lua code.

notes.Note: iconstantin> debian bug #1010265 mentions related code is introduced in 5.4

criterions.comment: lua5.2 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
lua5.3 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
lua5.4 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
lua50 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
